job description:
Position Title: Data Analyst

Position Number: 295279

Location: Littleton, CO

Desired Skill Set:
ETL, SAP, Tableau

Position Description:
**C2C and STEM-OPT are not available**
  • *Only U.S. Citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. can be considered as W2 candidates.**
Title: Data Analyst - Level 2
Work Location: LITTLETON/WATERON, CO
Contract-6 months

Job Description:
This is a data engineering position, which will be primarily responsible for working with project managers/leads to develop database views, data modeling requirements, as well as functional and technical documentation. They will need to understand the existing legacy code and convert it into corresponding HANA models, using best practices. Will also need to participate in all levels of testing, including integrated testing, performance testing, security testing, and user acceptance testing. Required to apply best practices and recommend solutions by identifying the advantages and disadvantages of the proposed solutions. Applicant must have excellent oral and writing communication skills.

Mandatory Skills:
  • SQL Development
  • STRONG SAP HANA Data Modeling, Building Views, Creating Stored Procedures and Table Function
  • STRONG SAP HANA Performance Analysis
  • ETL (e.g. SAP Data Services)
Desired Skills:
  • Celonis
  • Tableau
  • SAP BOBJ Reports / Web Intelligence
  • SAP SLT, SDA and SDI Interface
  • SAP ECC on Financial and Controlling and Supply Chain (Operations)
  • MS PowerPoint / Presentation Skills
#CBRose#
